text.content:
Lights Out

Crit Effect: The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Blinded]{Blinded} until the end of its next turn.

Bludgeoning

Bicep Wound

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Enfeebled]{Enfeebled 1} until healed.

Piercing

Bewildering Display

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} until the end of its next turn.

Slashing

Roaring Blast

The target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Deafened]{Deafened} until healed.

Bomb or Spell
